Answers Anywhere Agents Library

The Answers Anywhere Platform provides a number of standard and library agents. Refer to the Getting Started Tutorial and Agent Network Developer's Guide for descriptions of the standard agents.

List of library agents

  • Enumeration: Provides customizable enumeration value defined in an external configuration file.
  • Phrase: Claims on phrases (or multiple tokens)
  • DataSource: Helper agent to connect agent network to any kind of key-value pair data source. This agent returns the key of matched data and actuator can obtain matched data from data source by key.
